r.s: A Native Windows binding for PHP
r.d: WinBinder is a new extension that allows PHP programmers to build native Windows applications. It wraps the Windows API in a lightweight, easy-to-use library so that program creation is quick and straightforward.
r.n:
- Implemented the much awaited HTML control - New memory constants for wb_get_system_info() - Easy way to set/retrieve columns widths from ListViews - Custom-drawn windows now created with system background color - Optional standard window border for naked windows - Several bug fixes, corrections to manual and other improvements
Please make sure you read the changelog!
